pages.label: Home
pages.purpose: Landing page introducing the PBO and its mission
pages.primary_goal: Introduce the PBO and inspire engagement to join the global CSR standardization initiative.
audiences: South African citizens with civic duty
International financial and accounting standard bodies

sections.section_label: Introducing the PBO and Our Mission
sections.semantic_intent: To introduce the PBO's mission and invite users to join the initiative for global CSR standardization.
sections.narrative_role: Opening introduction with mission statement and primary call to action to engage users
sections.success_signal: Visitors understand the PBO's mission and are motivated to join the initiative.

sections.semantic_intent: To communicate the PBO's vision for transparent, impactful, and incentivized corporate citizenship globally.
sections.narrative_role: Vision statement setting aspirational goals and alignment with mission
sections.success_signal: Visitors grasp the aspirational vision of transparent and socially impactful corporate citizenship.

sections.semantic_intent: To showcase the core offerings and services that the PBO provides to its audiences.
sections.narrative_role: Overview of offerings including CSR measurement frameworks, education, strategic systems, and advocacy
sections.success_signal: Visitors understand the breadth of PBO's offerings and support services.

sections.semantic_intent: To build trust and credibility by presenting proof points validating the PBO's approach and alignment.
sections.narrative_role: Evidence and proofs that demonstrate credibility via governance, alignment, methodologies, and engagement
sections.success_signal: Visitors view the PBO as credible and trustworthy based on presented evidence.

sections.semantic_intent: To provide a call to action inviting visitors to participate and support the PBO's mission.
sections.narrative_role: Final call to action encouraging user engagement and participation
sections.success_signal: Visitors take action to join or support the global CSR standardization initiative.

pages.label: About
pages.purpose: Information about the organization, its background, and values
pages.primary_goal: Inform visitors about the organization's background, mission, vision, and key audiences served.
audiences: South African citizens with civic duty
International financial and accounting standard bodies

sections.semantic_intent: To provide background information and core values of the organization focusing on principled systemic reform and global citizenship.
sections.narrative_role: Introduction to the organization's background and core values
sections.success_signal: Visitors understand the organization's background and value principles.

sections.semantic_intent: To clearly communicate the mission and vision that drive the organization's work and objectives.
sections.narrative_role: Presentation of mission and vision statements
sections.success_signal: Visitors comprehend the mission and vision underlying the organization's efforts.

sections.semantic_intent: To identify and describe the key audiences that the organization is designed to support and engage.
sections.narrative_role: Listing and describing the primary audiences served
sections.success_signal: Visitors know the groups the organization serves and can identify with or target them.

pages.label: Objectives
pages.purpose: Details on the three core cross-border objectives of the PBO
pages.primary_goal: Present the organization's core objectives, supporting programs, and provide calls to engage with the mission.
audiences: South African citizens with civic duty
International financial and accounting standard bodies

sections.semantic_intent: To present the three core objectives guiding the organization's cross-border efforts.
sections.narrative_role: Summary list of foundational objectives
sections.success_signal: Visitors clearly understand the primary objectives the organization pursues globally.

sections.semantic_intent: To highlight the specific programs implemented to realize the stated objectives.
sections.narrative_role: Detailed presentation of key programs and their summaries
sections.success_signal: Visitors connect the programs with the organization's objectives and understand their purpose.

sections.semantic_intent: To invite and motivate visitors to participate in education and capacity building initiatives aligned with the objectives.
sections.narrative_role: Call to action to engage with and support the mission via participation
sections.success_signal: Visitors take action to support and participate in the organization's mission and programs.

pages.purpose: Information on CSR/CSI measurement frameworks and related standards

sections.semantic_intent: To introduce key CSR/CSI frameworks and standards relevant to the PBO's mission.
sections.narrative_role: Listing of important global resources and standards
sections.success_signal: Visitors recognize the frameworks and standards that underpin the organization's work.

sections.semantic_intent: To provide detailed contextual information on CSR/CSI frameworks, measurement, accounting and reporting standards.

sections.success_signal: Visitors gain a deeper understanding of the standards contextual to the mission.

sections.semantic_intent: To demonstrate the organization's alignment and credibility through global standards and methodologies.

sections.semantic_intent: To present proof points validating the effectiveness and reach of the advocacy efforts.

sections.semantic_intent: To invite visitors to support the advocacy initiatives for accounting reforms recognizing social value.
